title: Ticket #64: benchmark load at startd startup counted as non-Condor load
description: At startup, the condor_startd will run benchmarks, such as the Java Mips, which are not counted as CondorLoadAvg. Instead their load falls under LoadAvg, which can effect the START policy, causing delays in when slots become available.
remarks:
